sentences.en: A refundable deposit is payable on arrival.
sentences.cn: 可退还订金到店即可退还。

sentences.en: Guests were presented with glasses of bubbly on arrival.
sentences.cn: 客人来后，都有香槟酒招待。

sentences.en: He was the most junior and most recent arrival at the embassy.
sentences.cn: 在大使馆里，他是职位最低也是入职最晚的一位。

sentences.en: I was scared by the hullabaloo over my arrival.
sentences.cn: 人声鼎沸的欢迎场面把我吓了一跳。

sentences.en: Jon's arrival was a cue for more champagne.
sentences.cn: 乔恩一来就意味着要喝更多的香槟酒了。

sentences.en: On arrival, guests are offered wine or a champagne cocktail.
sentences.cn: 每位宾客一到场都会有人送上葡萄酒或香槟鸡尾酒。

sentences.en: On his arrival, Elaine met him at the bus station.
sentences.cn: 他来时，伊莱恩在汽车站迎接他。

sentences.en: Only the timely arrival of the police prevented the situation from becoming worse.
sentences.cn: 警方及时赶到才阻止了事态恶化。

sentences.en: Pretty soon after my arrival I found lodgings.
sentences.cn: 我到达之后，很快就找到了住处。

sentences.en: Security tightened in the capital in readiness for the president's arrival.
sentences.cn: 首都加强了警备，准备迎接总统的到来。

sentences.en: Shortly after my arrival at the school, I was befriended by an older girl.
sentences.cn: 我到学校后不久便得到了一位年龄较大的女孩友善对待。

sentences.en: Station staff announced the arrival of the train over the tannoy.
sentences.cn: 车站工作人员通过广播告知火车到站了。

sentences.en: The conversation was drowned by the arrival of the taxi.
sentences.cn: 到来的出租车的声音压过了谈话的声音。

sentences.en: The coronation broadcast marked the arrival of television.
sentences.cn: 加冕典礼的转播标志着电视时代的到来。

sentences.en: The first arrivals at the concert got the best seats.
sentences.cn: 最早来到音乐会的人坐上了最好的座位。

sentences.en: The monument predates the arrival of the druids in Britain.
sentences.cn: 这一遗迹在德鲁伊特来到不列颠前就已存在。

sentences.en: They have improved immeasurably since their arrival.
sentences.cn: 他们自来到这里以后，有了很大改进。

sentences.en: Traffic problems account for one third of late arrivals.
sentences.cn: 迟到的人有三分之一是因为交通问题。

phrases.tran_cn: 到达过程；需求到达过程
到达日；进口日期；入港日期
初至；最先到达火场的消防车

trans.tran_cn: 到达，到达者/物，引进，采用，推行，上任，送到，出现，到来，发生，初到者，出生，新生儿
trans.tran_en: when someone or something arrives somewhere
